automaton.approvalNotes:
Date:5Oct2016 Reason:show tech-support command timed out without returning complete information. Defect Devops:https://hub.jazz.net/ccm38/resource/itemName/com.ibm.team.workitem.WorkItem/9315
https://hub.jazz.net/ccm06/quickplanner/jazzhub.html#items:projectId=_F_H7VnfoEeSi-OIwg-tlIA&serverId=hub.jazz.net&planType=mywork&allIterations=true&itemId=31871 Email Id Changed to aautomat@in.ibm.com
automaton.name: TBK:NTW:CIS:R:C:Router Ping Down V1.0

EditVariableAction.script: neighbor_detail;
component_output+="\nNo further investigation is required as this seems to be a Power Outage when checked the neighbor.\n"; component_output;
crashreport_file='No crash file found.'; crashreport_file;
component_output+="\nFurther investigation is required as this is not a Power Outage.\n"; component_output;
dircmd="dir | in " + month + " " + day + ".*crashinfo"; dircmd;
var cmd = "show log | in " + month + " " + day + ".*(up|down)"; cmd;

EmailAction.body:
*** Please do not reply. It is a system generated Email ***
Hello Team,
Require your investigation on the following where there is an alert received over ping down on the Router.
Router: $!{device_hostname} Neighbor: $!{neighbor_detail}
Router Uptime: $!{uptime_out} minutes
Switch Uptime: $!{uptime_out_switch} minutes
Please investigate further. An ISM (Maximo ticket is already assigned for the same for investigation).
Thanks, VirtualEngineer. Sent By: $!{automaton.name} *** Please do not reply. It is a system generated Email ***
EmailAction.subject: IBM-TBK-DA:Attention:Ping down observed for a Router
IBM-TBK-DA:Attention:Ping down observed for a Router

EmailAction.body:
*** Please do not reply. It is a system generated Email ***
Hello Team,
Require your investigation on the following where there is an alert received over ping down on the Router.
$!{component_output}
An ISM (Maximo ticket) is already assigned for the same for investigation.
Thanks, VirtualEngineer. Sent By: $!{automaton.name} *** Please do not reply. It is a system generated Email ***
EmailAction.subject: IBM-TBK-DA:Attention:Ping down observed for a Router

EditVariableAction.script: connect_error="Situation - In jumpbox but cannot get to "+ jumpbox +"\n"; connect_error;
var red = 1; red;
connect_error="Situation - Cannot get to jumpbox while trying to get to "+ jumpbox +"\n"; connect_error;
var red = 0; red;
affected_host = host_name_element; affected_host;
connect_error="Situation - In jumpbox but cannot get to "+ jumpbox +" as ssh is still asking for password\n"; connect_error;

EmailAction.subject: ATTN: ${lsFolderName} : In jumpbox but cannot get to ${jumpbox}
ATTN: ${lsFolderName} : In jumpbox but cannot get to ${jumpbox}

EmailAction.body:
ATTN: ${lsFolderName}: Cannot get to jumpbox while trying to get to "${jumpbox}"
Sent by ${automaton.name}
EmailAction.subject: ATTN: ${lsFolderName}: Cannot connect to jumpbox

final_comp_out for Not Normal reload investigation
